.. _`Troubleshooting`:

Troubleshooting
===============
This section describes some common issues that can arise and possible solutions.

Issue #1
--------
<App.py not running>
<make sure you properly set up you virtual environment>

Issue #2
--------
Making a pull request to the wrong repository
when making a pull request, compare it to your own repo, ot profphip

Issue #3
--------
Path errors
making sure youre in the correct branch and using cd, switch, and ls to naigate to the correct path.
